name: places/ChIJzfG-8ahZwokRAvBXCLL4mns
formattedAddress: 12 W 32nd St, New York, NY 10001, USA
adrFormatAddress: 12 W 32nd St, New York, NY 10001, USA

originalText.text: Ara medical group is a SCAM !! They take you in for general check ups and then refuse to email you your reports. Then Call you to the office on context of giving the reports and charge the insurance for the visit as COUNSELING and Re-EVALUATION. I visited them in Dec 2018 as an appointment was easily available, Dr Lee was notified of my medications (prescription) and my current condition prior to my blood work results( you write them on your intake form!). Yet she claims to have called me In because my results were alarming and that she needed to prescribe medications for me. I received their invoice after few months. I specifically had asked them before leaving if I will be charged for this and they said NO, yet I received this invoice. After going back and forth with their billing dept,Sarah said they will write it off and then I receive a call from the collections office. BEWARE and do not go here. The Doctor is great but this practice is horrible. They cheat patients and ruin the experience of health care. Be clear to the patient that the visit will be charged, please don’t cheat!

originalText.text:
I'm changing my health insurance just to keep her as my Dr. She listens very well and that's one of the few things I like about her!
Oh and as far as test results goes, there emailed to me so we can go over them together the next time I have a appointment.

originalText.text: Do not go to this phony scammer pretending to be a doctor. Please read up on her before you make a decision because your health is at stake. If you’ve already seen her, get a second opinion. You will get better care at any walk-in clinic. She will diagnose you with a condition you don’t have (thyroid issue is a popular one) She prescribed me 4 medications, I lost 13 lbs in 2 weeks. 2 of the medications have been recalled.  Please do some research before you decide to see her and stay safe!

originalText.text: Great doctor. She is now at 16 W 32nd St on the 9th floor.

text.text: Great doctor. She is now at 16 W 32nd St on the 9th floor.

originalText.text:
I would give 0 start if I can! Avoid this doc at all cost! She is utterly useless, did not even ask too much and give me the advice that is completely useless, then charge me over 230 for a single primary doc visit which should be normally around 20 something after my insurance! They would scam you to death with all kinds of made up excuses: for example in her billing she name one item called ‘ New patient visit over 30min’ and charge over 100 dollars, but all time I get to see the doc is about 5-10min. I am pretty sure a lot of people booked her by Zocdoc, I am not even allowed to share my experience there at Zocdoc because they do not allow you to mention how much you paid.
Again, avoid this doctor at all cost!!!!!
If you have already seen her, get your insurance company to refute the claim ASAP!
